<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\Returns &lt;NumElts x ElemTy&gt;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// It works for both scalar and vector \\p ElemTy.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/vecutils/#a77936f3aa272a4d31b547919e87b85d6"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/type">Type</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/vecutils/#a77936f3aa272a4d31b547919e87b85d6">getWideType</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/type">Type</a> &#42;ElemTy, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumElts) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ElemTy-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/type/#ab72c549a3c63bf2f0093dc66b8a50e49">isVectorTy</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;VecTy = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;FixedVectorType&gt;</a>(ElemTy);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ElemTy = VecTy-&gt;getElementType();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">      NumElts = VecTy-&gt;getNumElements() &#42; NumElts;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/fixedvectortype/#a57efbbb713b15812ad4fa3770e8a9ead">FixedVectorType::get</a>(ElemTy, NumElts);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\Returns the instruction in \\p Instrs that is lowest in the BB. Expects</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// that all instructions are in the same BB.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/vecutils/#a089cccbe66baa77d85c8a291030c7796"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/vecutils/#a089cccbe66baa77d85c8a291030c7796">getLowest</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;Instruction &#42;&gt;</a> Instrs) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;LowestI = Instrs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#a721fc555cb3d8dc2a1a680dcc2ce69b2">front</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a02981de53fb6ffd384d39addc4d25f37">drop&#95;begin</a>(Instrs)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LowestI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/instruction/#ad1664de8206ba30fc8d13a01850f42db">comesBefore</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlight">        LowestI = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LowestI;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\Returns the lowest instruction in \\p Vals, or nullptr if no instructions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// are found. Skips instructions not in \\p BB.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/vecutils/#a47d4037afa835a57270728d8d3ffb051"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/vecutils/#a47d4037afa835a57270728d8d3ffb051">getLowest</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;Value &#42;&gt;</a> Vals, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sandboxir/#a60f87746e4945fda7ea3d5a983c9b62c">BasicBlock</a> &#42;BB) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Find the first Instruction in Vals that is also in &#96;BB&#96;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> It = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac78c09ae232b2ce188ff590d51e3c268">find&#95;if</a>(Vals, &#91;BB&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/value">Value</a> &#42;V) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;Instruction&gt;</a>(V) &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;Instruction&gt;</a>(V)-&gt;getParent() == BB;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we couldn&#39;t find an instruction return nullptr.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (It == Vals.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#a7ca5197533a9c1fb8a2bd30587fcec6b">end</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;FirstI = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;Instruction&gt;</a>(&#42;It);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Now look for the lowest instruction in Vals starting from one position</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// after FirstI.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;LowestI = FirstI;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;V : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a341215803e83773a3e97860dc291f121">make&#95;range</a>(std::next(It), Vals.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#a7ca5197533a9c1fb8a2bd30587fcec6b">end</a>())) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;Instruction&gt;</a>(V);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Skip non-instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> == </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Skips instructions not in \\p BB.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;getParent() != BB)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If &#96;LowestI&#96; comes before &#96;I&#96; then &#96;I&#96; is the new lowest.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LowestI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/instruction/#ad1664de8206ba30fc8d13a01850f42db">comesBefore</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlight">        LowestI = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LowestI;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// If \\p I is not a PHI it returns it. Else it walks down the instruction</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// chain looking for the last PHI and returns it. \\Returns nullptr if \\p I is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// nullptr.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/vecutils/#a44997afa363c2b4d0d083e8b8930f1af"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/vecutils/#a44997afa363c2b4d0d083e8b8930f1af">getLastPHIOrSelf</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;LastI = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> != </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;PHINode&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight">      LastI = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;getNextNode();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LastI;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// If all values in \\p Bndl are of the same scalar type then return it,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// otherwise return nullptr.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/vecutils/#a033de8f81a298858c0219b067c983618"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/type">Type</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/vecutils/#a033de8f81a298858c0219b067c983618">tryGetCommonScalarType</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;Value &#42;&gt;</a> Bndl) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/value">Value</a> &#42;V0 = Bndl&#91;0&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/type">Type</a> &#42;Ty0 = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/utils/#a94ed4ff75262c5c7bf6107a1cb09d583">Utils::getExpectedType</a>(V0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/type">Type</a> &#42;ScalarTy = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/vecutils/#ab3b71740aabd9ed0695bae2780f0247d">VecUtils::getElementType</a>(Ty0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;V : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a02981de53fb6ffd384d39addc4d25f37">drop&#95;begin</a>(Bndl)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/type">Type</a> &#42;NTy = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/utils/#a94ed4ff75262c5c7bf6107a1cb09d583">Utils::getExpectedType</a>(V);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/type">Type</a> &#42;NScalarTy = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/vecutils/#ab3b71740aabd9ed0695bae2780f0247d">VecUtils::getElementType</a>(NTy);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NScalarTy != ScalarTy)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ScalarTy;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Similar to tryGetCommonScalarType() but will assert that there is a common</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// type. So this is faster in release builds as it won&#39;t iterate through the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// values.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/vecutils/#a1d1c2bc5710b2b6ca489fed0de8f8c54"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/type">Type</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/vecutils/#a1d1c2bc5710b2b6ca489fed0de8f8c54">getCommonScalarType</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;Value &#42;&gt;</a> Bndl) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/value">Value</a> &#42;V0 = Bndl&#91;0&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/type">Type</a> &#42;Ty0 = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/utils/#a94ed4ff75262c5c7bf6107a1cb09d583">Utils::getExpectedType</a>(V0);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/vecutils/#a033de8f81a298858c0219b067c983618">tryGetCommonScalarType</a>(Bndl) &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Expected common scalar type!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\Returns the first integer power of 2 that is &lt;= Num.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/vecutils/#afa56faa35b026a814f2fd65fd3016a4d">getFloorPowerOf2</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Num);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#ifndef NDEBUG</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Helper dump function for debugging.</span></CodeLine>
